short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click highlighted text to quickly search Chegg!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need to quickly search Chegg for a problem? Instead of copying & pasting it into Google or Chegg you can now simply highlight the problem, right click it, and press search Chegg!
